All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminFacade
    AdminFacade This is a facade class of the administrator. it contains all the actions the administrator of the system can do. this class extends ClientFacade and Override it's login method
    Category
    Category is an Enum Class that contains all category options for coupons
    ClientFacade
    ClientFacade the abstract class which the client types facades will implement through the LoginManager
    ClientType
    ClientType is an Enum Class that contains all Client type options for the Login Manager
    CompaniesDBDAO
    CompaniesDBDAO the class that implements the CompaniesDAO, with all the methods the Company class will use. this class create the changes in the DB through the connectionPool
    Company
    Company is a Class that creates a Company and Extends the PropertiesB that Extends PropertiesA
    CompanyFacade
    CompanyFacade This is a facade class of the companies. it contains all the actions the companies in the system can do. this class extends ClientFacade and Override it's login method
    ConnectionPool
    ConnectionPool class creates a singleTon to allow basic connection to the DB for all the DBDAO classes
    Coupon
    Coupon is a Class that creates the Coupon and Extends PropertiesA
    CouponExpirationDailyJob
    CouponExpirationDailyJob class is a daily job that checks to find all the expired coupons and delete them.
    CouponsDBDAO
    CouponsDBDAO the class that implements the CouponsDAO, with all the methods the Coupon class will use. this class create the changes in the DB through the connectionPool
    Customer
    Customer is a Class that creates a Customer and Extends the PropertiesB that Extends PropertiesA
    CustomerDBDAO
    CustomerDBDAO the class that implements the CustomerDAO, with all the methods the Customer class will use. this class create the changes in the DB through the connectionPool
    CustomerFacade
    CustomerFacade This is a facade class of the customers. it contains all the actions the customers in the system can do. this class extends ClientFacade and Override it's login method
    GeneralException
    GeneralException class create a new Exception called GeneralException that gets the exception and prints it
    ICompaniesDAO
    ICompaniesDAO the interface that define all the methods the CompaniesDBDAO will use to make changes on the DB.
    ICouponsDAO
    ICouponsDAO the interface that define all the methods the CouponsDBDAO will use to make changes on the DB.
    ICustomersDAO
    ICustomersDAO - the interface that define all the methods the CustomersDBDAO will use to make changes on the DB.
    LoginManager
    LoginManager is a Singleton class that allows 3 type of clients to login to the system
    Program  
    PropertiesA
    PropertiesA is a Class that creates the basic property that is common to the coupon, customer and company- the ID
    PropertiesB
    PropertiesB is a Class that creates the second basic property that is common to the customer and company - Email, Passwors and an ArrayList of Coupons
    Test
    Test class is the class that contains a testAll method that checks all the logic actions for the system users- the Administrator, the Companies and the Customers
